mapper.insert: insert into dz_salaryUser( id, name, department, identify, password, addTime, updateTime, status ) values( #{id}, #{name}, #{department}, #{identify}, #{password}, #{addTime}, #{updateTime}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update dz_salaryUser set name=#{name}, department=#{department}, identify=#{identify}, password=#{password}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, status=#{status} where id=#{id}
update dz_salaryUser set status = '-1' where id in (${ids})
mapper.select: select id,name,department,identify,password,addTime,updateTime,status from dz_salaryUser where status != '-1' order by id desc
